name: Anubian
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., passive Perception 11

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The anubian makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Haboob (1/Day)
actions.desc: A 30-foot-tall cylinder of sand forms in the anubian's space and moves with it for 10 minutes, until the anubian ends the storm as a bonus action, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). The area within 5 feet of the anubian is heavily obscured. A creature that starts its turn in that area or enters the area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be restrained by the storm. While restrained, the creature takes 3 (1d6) slashing damage at the start of each of its turns, and moves with the anubian when the anubian moves. A creature, including the restrained creature, can use its action to free the restrained creature by succeeding on a DC 13 Strength check.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: The anubian doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Sand Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The anubian has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in sandy terrain.

special_abilities.name: Sand Form
special_abilities.desc: The anubian can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Vulnerability to Water
special_abilities.desc: For every 5 feet the anubian moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 2 (1d4) cold damage. An anubian completely immersed in water takes 10 (4d4) cold damage at the start of its turn.
